availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: M. V. Bowen (Mercer County, Kentucky, shoemaker)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Married to Paralee Gabhart on September 20, 1859. Shoemaker in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 3. Kentucky, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900 [database on-line], Mercer County Marriages, Roll #unknown. Find A Grave, "M.V. Bowen, (March 17, 1838-July 21, 1866)," Memorial #100536842, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=100536842 (accessed June 4, 2017).
